short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you get through your oldest emails first while new ones are still coming in visible.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reverse your Gmail Priority Inbox and get through the emails you meant to. New emails are added to the bottom of your inbox so you are not distracted to answer those first.
